Subject: Question Regarding 'Microsoft Remote Desktop' Policy in CAP
Description:
Hello,

There is a policy called 'Microsoft Remote Desktop' in CAP. Currently, I understand that 'Microsoft Remote Desktop' has been changed to a 'Windows APP'. However, even though there is only 'Microsoft Remote Desktop', if I check to block 'Microsoft Remote Desktop' in CAP, will the 'Windows APP' still be blocked by the same policy?

I am currently testing the blocking policy for 'Microsoft Remote Desktop' on a Mac, but it seems that the blocking is not working.
What_We_Know__c:
'Microsoft Remote Desktop' has been changed to a by Windows APP.
Windows APP is not covered by Epp.
Next_Steps__c:
2025.04.24: The processname was added manually to the customer's server.
Asfeature request is open for the processname to be added to the main build.
